trans-unit.source: Instructions to successfully sign in with your personal account, access Visual Studio subscription details and consume benefits based on subscription type.
trans-unit.target: Instructions to successfully sign in with your personal account, access Visual Studio subscription details and consume benefits based on subscription type.

trans-unit.source: Steps for Successful Sign In: Using "Work or School" Account and "Personal" Microsoft Account
trans-unit.target: Steps for Successful Sign In: Using "Work or School" Account and "Personal" Microsoft Account

trans-unit.source: Are you a company-based subscriber and you do not have an Azure Active Directory Account, although your organization has an Azure Active Directory?
trans-unit.target: Are you a company-based subscriber and you do not have an Azure Active Directory Account, although your organization has an Azure Active Directory?

trans-unit.source: Then you might be required to use your “personal” account to sign in to https://my.visualstudio.com.
trans-unit.target: Then you might be required to use your “personal” account to sign in to https://my.visualstudio.com.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Sign In with "Work or School" Account and "Personal" Microsoft Account article for additional details on successful sign in and benefit validation.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the Sign In with "Work or School" Account and "Personal" Microsoft Account article for additional details on successful sign in and benefit validation.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the Signing in with your work or school account article for additional details on successful sign in and benefit validation.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the Signing in with your work or school account article for additional details on successful sign in and benefit validation.
